# Ignore files generated by Eclipse
.project
.classpath
.settings/

# Ignore the build directory
/bin/

# Ignore Maven/Gradle related files
target/
build/

# Ignore compiled Java files
*.class

# Ignore logs and temporary files
*.log
*.tmp
*.bak
*.swp
*.swo
*.DS_Store

# Ignore package files
*.jar
*.war
*.nar
*.ear
*.zip
*.tar.gz
*.rar

# Ignore virtual machine crash logs
hs_err_pid*
replay_pid*

# Ignore IDE specific files
.idea/
*.iml

# Ignore operating system-specific files
Thumbs.db
desktop.ini
